category.simplystatus.name: SimplyStatus
config.simplystatus.notConnected:
You are not connected to Discord!
Check if you have it running.
config.simplystatus.notConnectedLinux: If you have Discord installed through a third party app store like Flatpak, Snap, etc. Then look at RPC solutions on the Internet, preferably about your application store and systems
